Here we provide templates and resources for documenting your research from within your rProject.

`4_bookdown_readme`: A template for creating a markdown readme using bookdown

`5_bookdown_html`: A template for creating a project html document (<https://bookdown.org/bgcasey/project_documentation/>)

`6_bookdown_pdf`: A template for creating pdf documents

`7_markdown_manuscript`: A template for writing your manuscript via markdown.
